import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; import '../styles/news.css' export default function News(){ var [news,setNews]=useState([]) var [sources,setSources]=useState([]) var [CNNnews,setCNNnews]=useState([]) function getNewsByCategory(e){ axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/top-headlines/category/${e.target.value}/in.json`) .then((res)=>{ setNews(res.data.articles) }) } function getNewsBySource(e){ axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/everything/${e.target.value}.json`) .then((res)=>{ setNews(res.data.articles) }) } axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/sources.json`) .then((res)=>{ setSources(res.data.sources) }) return( <>
